Frequently Asked Questions

How many households are on the DIRECTV Addressable
Advertising platform?

DIRECTV Addressable Advertising is available nationally on 46 networks to over 12 million households. It’s the largest national platform of its kind.

Who am I capable of targeting?

In a word, anybody. You can select from a robust list of over 200 attributes. They range from basic to deep—from traditional demographic criteria to granular psychographic criteria like shopping propensity and personal interests. This makes it really easy to reach your target audience.

How does my commercial reach my desired audience?

First, through a series of sampling and verifications, we determine your best audience. Then, your commercial is downloaded only to those households’ DVRs. The ad can air during live TV as well as during DVR playback. This means that it is ready to play precisely when your target audience is ready to watch, every time.

How is it all measured and reported?

KANTAR Media is our trusted third-party source for campaign verification, measurement, and reporting. They help identify target audiences and verify execution before each campaign. Additionally, we have strategic partnerships with industry-renowned data partners to provide advanced reporting to further refine results and understand sales lift, lead lift, ROI, and more.

Have you done any testing with clients?

We have. And based on their success, we’re ramping up our addressable advertising capabilities to make our platform—which is already the largest national platform of its kind—even bigger.
